text:
@BryanCranston Chris Cuomos wife wrote a health blog on how she bathes in Clorox to treat coronavirus.
Media : *nothing*
Trump suggests looking into alternative treatment options like UV light and disinfectants.
Blue Check Marks : https://t.co/EYKjDS1vjE
